Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.access

Class Summary
AllowUserLoginAction Action used to reenable a user to login immediately if his login was blocked by wrong password tries
AllowUserLoginForm Form used to reenable a user to login immediately if his login was blocked by wrong password tries
ChangeExpiredPasswordAction Action called when a user had his/her password expired, forcing he/she to change it
ChangePasswordAction Changes the password of a given element
ChangePasswordForm  
DisconnectUserAction Action used to disconnect a logged user
DisconnectUserForm Form used to disconnect an user
DisconnectUserSessionAction Action used to disconnect a logged user session
DisconnectUserSessionForm Form used to disconnect an user session
ExternalLoginAction Action used to login the user from within external sites
ListConnectedUsersAction Action used to search for the connected users
ListConnectedUsersForm Form used to search for connected users
LoginAction Action used to login the user
LoginForm Form for login
LogoutAction Action used to logout the logged user
ManagePasswordsAction Action used to manage an user's passwords: login and transaction
ManagePasswordsForm Form used to manage a member's passwords
ResetAndSendPasswordAction Action used to reset a member's password and send it by mail
ResetAndSendPasswordForm Form used to reset a member's password and send it by mail
 

Enum Summary
ExternalLoginAction.Status The possible statuses
